Author: Adult X Token (ADUX)
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Adult X Token (ADUX) - All-In-One Solution for the Adult Industry
Body: Thankfully there are existing already a couple of adult-crypto-projects who have beside the "pay with cryptocurrency"-feature some more things to offer. Nevertheless their main focus is almost exclusively adapted to the needs and wants of the end-user.  Our slogan and mission is to provide an "all-in-one solution for the adult entertainment industry" whether it's the end consumer, an independent model/performer, an agency/studio, a well established company, affiliate marketers and so on ... only to name a few.  Through my many years of working in the adult industry (mostly "offline" and with direct contact to sexworkers and their customers) I have big experience in this space and now exactly what's important and where is need for improvement.  The Adult X-Project consists of three pillars: ADUxHub - Decentralized Adult Entertainment Platform ADUxPay - Decentralized Adult Payment Platform ADUxJob - Decentralized Adult Job Platform  Our main site, the "ADUxHub" (Adult X Hub) is a platform with main purpose in entertaining end users and consumers of all kinds of sexual orientations.  Marketplace ‚Ä¢ ADUxDeal: Discounts, Deals and Vouchers We guarantee discount rates at the best possible conditions, including memberships for adult paysites and similar, romantic hotels/holidays for couples or bottle services in nightclubs all over the world...  ‚Ä¢ ADUxShop: Adult Clothing, Toys and Accesories (live in the upcoming days) With currently about 17,000 items in stock we are providing an adult lifestyle shop with a wide range of adult clothing, toys and accesories.  Entertainment ‚Ä¢ ADUxCams: Adult Live Cams and Social Network A place where users and fans are able to interact with adult amateur/semi-pro/professional models/performers (male, female, couples, tv/ts).  ‚Ä¢ ADUxChat: Sexting/Sex Chat Consumers and fans are able to text and share pictures with their favourite models/performers 24/7 via our Mobile App.  ‚Ä¢ ADUxTalk: Phone Sex Talk Same as above except for the difference that the customers are able to talk with their favourite models/performers via our Mobile App.  ‚Ä¢ ADUxTube: Video Sharing and VOD (Video on Demand) Part of the "Adult Live Cams and Social Network" where consumers are able to get access to private and exclusive content of their favourite models/performers.   With ADUxPay we are providing a fast, simple and low-cost way to pay and get paid worldwide. As we are running our own financial service provider we are able to fullfill all needs of our customers (custom payout limits, 24/7 support and so on ...)  Multi-Currency Wallet (live in the upcoming days) ‚Ä¢ Secure storage incl. trezor hardware wallet support ‚Ä¢ Currency swap ‚Ä¢ Send currencies  ADUxPay Virtual & Physical Plastic Card ‚Ä¢ Classic Card For Customers Virtual & Physical Plastic Card Daily Limit: $ 1,000 Acceptance at over 20 million dealers Fast payment and conversion of Crypto- to FIAT currency ATM withdrawals 24/7 Support  ‚Ä¢ Black Card As our Black Card will only be available in a limited quanitity (phsysical metal card) the cardholder will have the opportunity to use a special 24/7 concierge service where his/her personal concierge will help in all kind of cases and situations (bookings, events and so on). The concierge service will be offered in cooperation with a world famous company who is specialized in providing worldwide  concierge services in multi-languages (Since years I'm already working with the company and there possibilites are nearly endless, the services and offers provided by them is not included and will be charged separately.) Limited Quantity Virtal & Physical Metal Card Daily Limit: $ 10,000 Acceptance at over 20 million dealers Fast payment and conversion of Crypto- to FIAT currency ATM withdrawals 24/7 Support No annual fee (lifetime) Concierge Service Special Benefits  ‚Ä¢ Business Card For Companies, Models/Performers, Affiliate Partners Virtual & Physical Plastic Card Daily Limit: $ 5,000 (individual) Acceptance at over 20 million dealers Fast payment and conversion of Crypto- to FIAT currency ATM withdrawals 24/7 Support No annual fee for Models/Performers of "ADUxJob" Personal Account Manager  Merchant Tools ‚Ä¢ Payment Gateway and API ‚Ä¢ Instant Payment Notification ‚Ä¢ Invoice Builder ‚Ä¢ POS (Point of Sale) Interface ‚Ä¢ Payment- and Donation Buttons Maker  As ADUxPay will be connected to the ADUxHub and as well to the ADUxJob platform this results in a serious simplification in the independent work especially for models/performers, but also for affiliate marketeers.  Short explained how the ADUxPay Card will be working:  User pays at the merchant using his physical (or virtual) ADUxPay Card. The card network will send an authorization request to the servers for the purchase Amount. Then ADUxPay will send an invoice through the network to the user. The user can then choose which blockchain asset to use for the payment (ADUX, BTC, ETH or LTC) and send the correct amount to ADUxPay through the network. Upon receiving the corresponding amount for the invoice, ADUxPay will authorize the payment to the merchant and the transaction is finished.   With ADUxJob we are offering a big service platform where not only independent models/performers but also webcamstudios, agencies and such are able to work and get paid in cryptocurrencies like BTC, ETH, LTC and ADUX.  Job opportunities including: ‚Ä¢ ADUxDeal: Discounts, Deals and Vouchers ‚Ä¢ ADUxShop: Adult Clothing, Toys and Accesories ‚Ä¢ ADUxCams: Adult Live Cams and Social Network ‚Ä¢ ADUxChat: Sexting/Sex Chat ‚Ä¢ ADUxTalk: Phone Sex Talk ‚Ä¢ ADUxTube: Video Sharing and VOD   And last but not least, one last thing which makes me personally very proud, will be our ADUxFame: Adult Talent Agency where we already got a lot of active adult models/performers (informations and announcements will be provided in december) who are currently "only" working as webcam hosts and are already excited to start working with our other featured services. Our own Adult Talent Agency will also provide every kind of help which is needed (by newcomers or experienced performers) to start working on our. Beside the fact that there will be an information center for models/performers with advises and tipps, there will be also the opportunity to get own personalized websites with an easy to use backend where the models/performers have the opportunity to sell any kind of digital or physical goods or to start a webcam live stream with the click of a button.  Best regards, Jovan

Author: Adult X Token (ADUX)
Title: [ANN] [ICO] Adult X Token (ADUX) - All-In-One Solution for the Adult Industry
Body: The adult entertainment industry has a staggering world wide annual turnover of around 100 billion dollars. Despite the commercialisation of the industry in recent years, there are still concerns for consumers around anonymity and the safety of sensitive data.  This is where the project Adult X Hub (ADUxHub) and Adult X Token (ADUX) step in. Based on Blockchain technology, our company the "sevensale online GmbH" want to create a total solution for the users of the Adult Entertainment Industry. Away from governmental control, away from credit card payments and the sharing of this data, and towards payment by cryptocurrencies and the creation of new opportunities offered by this technology.  A new platform is in the pipeline called the Adult X Hub (ADUxHub). Launching on Friday, 18th January 2019. This will offer users a market place to buy products and services as well as receive discounts by way of Vouchers.  The platform will also include Adult Live Streams and a Social Network. In support of the primary online platform in the 1st Quarter 2019 for a better user experience a Mobile Application (for Android and iOS) will be available allowing the customer to make even better use of our "all-in-one" offering.  Alongside the Adult X Hub (ADUxHub) will be the launch of the Adult X Token (ADUX), which along with Bitcoin, Ethereum and Litecoin can be used for Crypto based payments.  The ADUX Token Crowdsale will begin on the 31st of August until the 30th of November 2018.  An additional purchase option for consumers will be the ADUxPay Prepaid Card, a prepaid card that will not only be accepted on the Adult X Hub (ADUxHub), but will also be useable as a worldwide form of payment, much the same as a Visa or Mastercard. For an investment of only 2 ETH (Ethereum) at our upcoming crowdsale, our customers entitled to order an ADUxPay Prepaid Card VIP for free where they receive even greater discounts and bonuses.  In the 2nd Quarter of 2019 an Adult Live Webcams will be launched. Models and Performers will be issued a free ADUxPay Prepaid Card Business, where earnings can be drawn upon to make immediate purchases.  Adult X Hub (ADUxHub) offers everyone the opportunity to broadcast themselves and earn money from home.  And finally in 2nd Quarter 2019 the Adult X Hub (ADUxHub) will launch its Social Networking platform, allowing users to connect, build Followers, Like, Rate and Comment on Pictures and Videos. Bringing together Performers and Users alike.  The Adult X Token (ADUX) and its integration on Adult X Hub (ADUxHub) offer an absolute, never seen before, "all‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääin‚Ää‚Äî‚Ääone solution" for the adult entertainment industry. With the deal system, live webcam platform and social network based on blockchain technology, the entire adult entertainment industry is drawing even closer together, as models/performers and companies from various niches in the industry can draw attention to themselves at Adult X Hub (ADUxHub).  ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è       ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è  Promotion Video    The ‚ÄúAdult X Token‚Äù (ADUX) and its integration on ‚ÄúADUxHub‚Äù offer an absolute, never seen before, ‚Äúall ‚Äì in ‚Äì one solution‚Äù for the adult entertainment industry. With the marketplace, live webcams and social network based on blockchain technology, the entire adult entertainment industry is drawing even closer together, as models/performers and companies from various niches in the industry can draw attention to themselves at ‚ÄûADUxHub‚Äú.  ‚Ä¢ Discount‚Äì and Deal Marketplace ‚Ä¢ Adult Live Webcams ‚Ä¢ Video On Demand, Video Sharing ‚Ä¢ Social Networking Platform ‚Ä¢ Affiliate Program ‚Ä¢ Mobile App for Android and iOS ‚Ä¢ ADUX, BTC, ETH and LTC accepted      A dynamic crypto-payments platform featuring fast, simple, and low-cost ways to pay and get paid worldwide, powered by our own banking/financial service provider.  ‚Ä¢ Own banking/financial service provider ‚Ä¢ ADUxPay Prepaid Card Classic ‚Ä¢ ADUxPay Prepaid Card VIP ‚Ä¢ ADUxPay Prepaid Card Business ‚Ä¢ An cryptocurrency gateway and a wallet ‚Ä¢ ADUX, BTC, ETH and LTC accepted  In order to manage all payment transactions with the in-house prepaid card, the ‚ÄúADUxPay‚Äù platform will be also integrated into the ‚ÄúADUxHub‚Äù and established there as a means of payment.  Management of the cards works through the ‚ÄúADUxPay‚Äù user panel and the accompanying mobile app for on-the-go handling.   ADUxPay Prepaid Card Classic   ‚Ä¢ Acceptance at over 20 million dealers ‚Ä¢ Fast payment and conversion of the cryptocurrency into FIAT currency (e.g. EUR / USD and much more) ‚Ä¢ ATM withdrawals of up to 300 USD/day* (Please be advised that some ATMs may charge their own fees.) ‚Ä¢ ATM withdrawals of up to 5000 USD/month* (Please be advised that some ATMs may charge their own fees.) ‚Ä¢ 0.5% withdrawing fee ‚Ä¢ Payment limit of up to 800 USD/day* ‚Ä¢ Payment limit of up to 10000 USD/month* ‚Ä¢ 25 USD annual fee (payment in ADUX, BTC, ETH or LTC) ‚Ä¢ Billing overview of every transaction in the ‚ÄûADUxPay‚Äú app  * The limits may vary.   ADUxPay Prepaid Card VIP   ‚Ä¢ Acceptance at over 20 million dealers ‚Ä¢ Fast payment and conversion of the cryptocurrency into FIAT currency (e.g. EUR / USD and much more) ‚Ä¢ ATM withdrawals of up to 300 USD/day* (Please be advised that some ATMs may charge their own fees.) ‚Ä¢ ATM withdrawals of up to 5000 USD/month* (Please be advised that some ATMs may charge their own fees.) ‚Ä¢ 0.5% withdrawing fee ‚Ä¢ Payment limit of up to 800 USD/day* ‚Ä¢ Payment limit of up to 10000 USD/month* ‚Ä¢ 25 USD annual fee (payment in ADUX, BTC, ETH or LTC) ‚Ä¢ Billing overview of every transaction in the ‚ÄûADUxPay‚Äú app  * The limits may vary.  For an investment of at least 2 ETH at our crowdsale, our customers entitled to order an ‚ÄúADUxPay Prepaid Card VIP‚Äù for free (lifetime).  VIP inquiries at vip@adultxtoken.com    "ADUxPay" and the "ADUxPay Prepaid Card Business" is the ideal all-in-one solution for all businesses in the adult entertainment industry.  ADUxPay Prepaid Card Business   ‚Ä¢ Personal account manager ‚Ä¢ The daily/monthly payout- and withdrawal limits* can be individually adapted to the company, model/performer ‚Ä¢ 0,3% ‚Äì max. 2% ATM withdrawing fee ‚Ä¢ No annual fee for Models/Performers of "ADUxHub" **  * The limit may vary.  ** 100 USD annual fee for models/performers of other sites (payment in ADUX, BTC, ETH or LTC)  Business inquiries at b2b@adultxtoken.com      Telegram Community Group  Telegram News Channel
